TM1637.TM1637LEDs._dat: set data to TM1637, with given bit
TM1637.TM1637LEDs.intensity: set TM1637 intensity, range is [0-8], 0 is off.
TM1637.TM1637LEDs.intensity|param|val: the brightness of the TM1637, eg: 7
TM1637.TM1637LEDs.showbit: show a number in given position.
TM1637.TM1637LEDs.showbit|param|bit: the position of the LED, eg: 0
TM1637.create|param|clk: the CLK pin for TM1637, eg: DigitalPin.P1
TM1637.create|param|count: the count of the LED, eg: 4
TM1637.create|param|dio: the DIO pin for TM1637, eg: DigitalPin.P2
TM1637.create|param|intensity: the brightness of the LED, eg: 7
